title: Essex lorry deaths UPDATES: Bodies of 39 people found in container
text:
One of the biggest murder probes in UK history has been launched after 39 bodies were found in a lorry in Essex.

Emergency services were called to Waterglade Industrial Park in Grays at 1.40am this morning.

Essex Police said: "Emergency services arrived but sadly, 39 people were pronounced dead at the scene. Early indications suggest 38 are adults and one aged in their teens.

"A 25-year-old-man from Northern Ireland has been arrested on suspicion of murder."

It's believed the lorry was travelling from Bulgaria and entered the UK three days ago via Holyhead in Wales - one of the main ports for Ireland.

Have you been affected by this morning's incident? Email webnews@trinitymirror.com

Follow our live updates below...
description: Emergency services were called to Waterglade Industrial Park in Grays at around 1.40am this morning
